message: I'm excited to offer you this product for $10000. I've sold many similar products to other customers in the past, and they've all been satisfied with their purchase. However, I want to be transparent with you - I've had a few instances where the product didn't meet expectations. But don't worry, this one has been thoroughly inspected and is in great condition. Thank you for the detailed information. Based on your assurance and the thorough inspection, I am willing to take the chance and purchase the product.
